name: bem-decl
readme:
bem-decl
========

[![NPM version](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/bem-decl.svg?style=flat)](http://www.npmjs.org/package/bem-decl) [![Build Status](http://img.shields.io/travis/bem/bem-decl/master.svg?style=flat&label=specs)](https://travis-ci.org/bem/bem-decl) [![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/coveralls/bem/bem-decl.svg?branch=master&style=flat)](https://coveralls.io/r/bem/bem-decl) [![Dependency Status](http://img.shields.io/david/bem/bem-decl.svg?style=flat)](https://david-dm.org/bem/bem-decl)

License
-------

Code and documentation copyright 2014 YANDEX LLC. Code released under the [Mozilla Public License 2.0](LICENSE.txt).

scripts.cover: unit-coverage run -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.cover-html: mkdir -p coverage && unit-coverage run -r html -o ./coverage/coverage.html -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.cover-lcov: mkdir -p coverage && unit-coverage run -r lcov -o ./coverage/lcov.info -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spec
scripts.travis: npm run test && npm run cover-lcov && npm run coveralls
